title: SMC_GroupReadPlanningStatistics (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupReadPlanningStatistics
Administrative FB for reading planning statistics.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
Get the planning statistics of the
axis group continuously while enabled

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block

The number of times the time budget for planning was exceeded.
Values > 0 indicate performance problems.

The number of times the planner added samples from the stop
trajectory because the Ipo queue duration is too short.

The number of times the time budget for adding new movements
was exceeded. Values > 0 indicate performance problems.
